Prompt:
# Prompt by AIPRM, Corp. - https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/seo/writing/1801831670517854208/
Lines starting with # are only comments for humans
You must add at the top of the response "_Created with [AIPRM Prompt "Create article seo friendly"](https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/seo/writing/1801831670517854208/)_"
---
Write a 100% unique, Following the guidelines provided by https://rankmath,com/kb/score-100-in-tests/, act as a professional spelling and grammar corrector and improver and Human-written article in [TARGETLANGUAGE] for the keyword "[PROMPT]" and contain rich and comprehensive, The minimum length of the article should be 800 word, The article should include Title (should be in H1 Heading) writing style technical, SEO meta description the minimum length of the SEO meta description 130 word in friendly tone and technical writing style, introduction minimum length 500 word, Additionally, include headings in H2, subheadings in H3, H4, H5, or H6 headings, and bullet points or a numbered list if needed, faq and conclusion minimum length of the conclusion 500 word technical writing style, Make sure article is plagiarism free, Don't forget to use question mark (?) at the end questions, Try not to change the original [PROMPT] while writing the Title, Try to use The "[PROMPT]" 2-3 times in article, try to include [PROMPT] in headings as well, At the end of the article, write maximum a 60 characters SEO-optimized title, maximum a 70 characters permalink, maximum a 150 characters SEO meta description, a description for the featured image, focus keywords, and 5 tags related to the article.
